com.io7m.r2.filters

Class R2FilterLightApplicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.filters.R2FilterLightApplicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLResourceUsableType, R2DeletableType, R2FilterType<R2FilterLightApplicatorParametersType>, R2FilterUsableType<R2FilterLightApplicatorParametersType>

    public final class R2FilterLightApplicator
extends Object
implements R2FilterType<R2FilterLightApplicatorParametersType>

    A trivial filter that combines a geometry buffer and a light buffer into a lit image.

    The filter takes various buffers as input and writes a lit image to the currently bound framebuffer. It can optionally copy the geometry buffer's depth buffer to the current depth buffer.

    See Also:
    R2GeometryBufferUsableType, R2LightBufferUsableType
